title: Feather & Vylet Pony - Cupcakes
lyrics: You'll be my experiment my Dashie
A testament to my creativity
A masterful infusion, a concoction
Of your body and my insanity
Scheming up this perfect recipe
A demonstration of what you mean to me
A blood bond between sisters, a reduction
Of your flesh and my calamity
Do you even realise that you're screaming?
I'm so glad that you're enjoying all the fun
Look how fast your heart is beating now
Hold on to your hats, 'cause we're not quite done
Let me hear you
Let me hear you
I can see your rib cage, it’s a flower
I can hear your cries through profanity
Your screams are dying down, it’s a jumble
O’ the bloody mess of your vanity
Paint my face in crimson, I’m an artist
The canvas speaks of my brutality
Together; a performance for the ages
I forget the simple limits of mortality
And I know, I know, I know, I know, I know what’s in your heart
The fruit of my addiction, red just like your love
Do you even realise that you're screaming?
I'm so glad that you're enjoying all the fun
Look at how you blood is pooling now
Hold on to your hats, ‘cause we’re not quite done
Oh can you feel it?
Oh can you feel it?
Oh can you feel?
Oh! Can you feel it?
Oh can you feel it?
Oh can you feel it?
Oh can you feel?
Oh! Can you feel it?
You cannot imagine how I've wanted
To see what's on the inside of your head
Are you feeling tired, my dear Dashie?
Oh it seems you are because you're dead
